Game Manager Handy: You can participate in the game by talking to the manager of any one of the 4 arenas here. You can have up to 6 people per team, which means 12 per arena. You have to have at least 2 people per team to play. Everyone is welcome except chaotic criminals or those currently participating in the Olympiad or Kratei's Cube. [npc_%objectId%_Chat 0|Back]
